overview: Clear the ring for a brand new round of the cult series Street Flirts. Player Reinhard digs up the hottest women for us on the open road. Blonde or black, thick or thin, Reinhard lays them all for you. Provided his pick-up is successful.  This time, DSDS candidate Klaus Aichholzer, aka Mike, who has made a name for himself with his appearance as an ever-sharp super engraver, is also part of the party. He enthusiastically supports Reinhard on his awesome mission.
title: Strassenflirts 58
